actions.description: The plasmoid makes three Pseudopod attacks. It can replace one of those attacks with a Spear or Pistol attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Pseudopod

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.
actions.name: Spear

actions.description: 4 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Pistol

specialTraits.description: The plasmoid can squeeze through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide, provided it is wearing and carrying nothing. It has advantage on ability checks it makes to initiate or escape a grapple.
specialTraits.name: Amorphous

specialTraits.description: The plasmoid can hold its breath for 1 hour.
specialTraits.name: Hold Breath
